title: How to Do It: I Thought I Was Pro-Sex Work
description:
This week, Stoya and Rich answer letters from a woman who thought she was pro-sex work—until her friends started doing it. They also discuss another letter from a woman who is worried about what her boyfriend can’t seem to pull off during sex. 
Slate Plus members get another episode of the How to Do It podcast every Monday. Sign up for Slate Plus for just $1 for your first month.

Read the How to Do It column on Slate here. If you’re in need of sex advice from Stoya and Rich, write in here or leave a voicemail at ‪(347) 640-4025 and we may use it on the show. Remember, this is anonymous, and nothing is too small or embarrassing!
Production by Chau Tu.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: I never knew I’d judge my friends so harshly for a choice with their own bodies.
